text:
Hey folks :wave:  just wondering if any of you are currently using the Gatsby source plugin? <https://github.com/lewisvrobinson/gatsby-source-HubSpot>

I’m looking to add a collaborator or two to the project – I don’t work with HubSpot much these days but if the plugin is helpful to anyone it’d be great to see it supported and updated as the API grows and changes.

If anyone’s keen to help out (or you know someone that might be) just let me know :slightly_smiling_face:
